alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 03 at 8:59AM EST until December 03 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Lake and Ashtabula Lakeshore Counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Erie County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...The strongest winds will occur along the Lake Erie shoreline.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
